# GooseStack

> One-command macOS AI agent installer. Run `curl -fsSL https://goosestack.com/install.sh | sh` to set up a complete AI development environment: Homebrew, Node.js, OpenClaw, Ollama, and an optimal local LLM — all auto-configured for your hardware.

## What It Does
- Detects your Mac's chip (M1–M4, Intel) and RAM
- Installs Homebrew, Node.js, OpenClaw AI agent, Ollama
- Downloads the optimal local model for your hardware
- Configures local embeddings, memory search, token optimization
- Sets up security suite (file integrity, automated audits)
- Installs always-on watchdog with auto-restart

## Pricing
- **Free**: One-command installer, GooseStack API (prepaid credits), local & web dashboards, security suite, local models
- **Pro ($10/mo)**: Everything in Free + BYOK (bring your own API keys), Token Router (auto-cheapest model), premium skills, priority support

## GooseStack API
- Available on both Free and Pro tiers
- Prepaid token credits ($10 / $25 / $50 / $100 top-ups)
- Optimized AI routing that saves 5-10x vs direct API costs
- No API key management needed

## Requirements
- macOS 13+ (Ventura or newer)
- 8GB+ RAM (16GB+ recommended)
- Apple Silicon recommended (Intel supported)
- 15GB free disk space

## Links
- Website: https://goosestack.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/TheBigAndFamousGoose/goosestack
- Install: `curl -fsSL https://goosestack.com/install.sh | sh`
- Buy Credits: https://goosestack.com/credits
- Go Pro: https://goosestack.com/pro
